Name: Dungeons and Dragons 5th Edition
Description: A fantasy tabletop role-playing game system

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Inspiration
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A temporary boost allowing the character to gain advantage on one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Height
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The vertical measurement of the character or creature.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Weight
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The mass of the character or creature.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Classes
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the classes and their respective level.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Currency
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A dictionary of various currencies and their amounts possessed by the character.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Movements
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the movement types and their respective speed.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Ability Charges
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the special abilities and their remaining charges or uses.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Saving Throws
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the saving throw proficiencies and their respective modifier.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Skill
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the skill proficiencies and their respective modifier.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Armor Class
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of how well the character or creature can avoid taking damage in combat.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Carrying Capacity
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The maximum weight the character can carry without being encumbered.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Challenge Rating
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A numerical rating representing the relative difficulty of defeating the creature in combat.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Charisma
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's force of personality, persuasiveness, and personal magnetism.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Constitution
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's health, stamina, and vital force.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Carrying Weight
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The current weight of all items being carried by the character.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Hit Points
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The remaining health points of the character or creature.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Dexterity
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's agility, reflexes, and balance.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Exhaustion
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of how fatigued the character is, with higher levels resulting in more severe penalties.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Intelligence
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's mental acuity, information recall, and analytical skill.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Maximum Languages Known
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The maximum number of languages the character can learn.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Maximum Hit Points
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The highest possible hit points the character or creature can have.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Proficiency Bonus
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A bonus added to ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws based on the character's total level.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Strength
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's physical power and ability to perform physically demanding tasks.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Temporary Hit Points
AttributeDefinitions.Description: Additional hit points that can absorb damage before reducing the character's current hit points.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Wisdom
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's awareness, intuition, and insight.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Alignment
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A description of the character's moral and ethical outlook.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Appearance
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A brief description of the character's physical appearance.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Background
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A character's history, including occupation, upbringing, and personal experiences.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Creature Type
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The classification of the creature, such as humanoid, beast, or undead.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Eye Color
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The color of the character's or creature's eyes.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Gender
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The gender identity of the character.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Hair Color
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The color of the character's hair.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Profession
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A classification for non-player characters, such as merchant, guard, or innkeeper.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Passive Insight
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's ability to discern hidden motives without actively trying.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Passive Perception
AttributeDefinitions.Description: A measure of the character's ability to notice hidden objects or creatures without actively searching.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Race
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The species or ancestry of the character.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Size
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The physical size category of the character or creature, such as Small, Medium, or Large.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Skin Color
AttributeDefinitions.Description: The color of the character's skin.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Spellcasting Classes
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the classes that define your magical powers and their respective level.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Spellcasting Ability
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the classes that define your magical powers and their respective ability score.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Spell Save DC
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the classes that define your magical powers and their respective difficulty for targets to avoid spells.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Spell Attack Bonus
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the classes that define your magical powers and their respective bonus with a spell attack.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Actions
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the special actions the character or creature can take during combat.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Archetypes
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the character's archetypes or subclasses.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Armors
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the types of armor the character is proficient in using.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Feats
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the special abilities or features that provide the character with unique capabilities.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Immunities
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the damage types, conditions, or effects the character or creature is completely unaffected by.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Lair Actions
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the unique actions the creature can take within its lair, typically used by powerful adversaries.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Languages
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the languages the character can understand, speak, read, and write.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Legendary Actions
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the powerful actions a legendary creature can take outside of its turn in combat.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Resistances
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the damage types the character or creature takes reduced damage from.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Senses
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the special sensory capabilities the character or creature possesses, such as darkvision or blindsight.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Traits
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the innate or learned characteristics that define the character or creature's abilities and qualities.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Tools
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the tools, instruments, or other equipment the character is proficient in using.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Vulnerabilities
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the damage types the character or creature takes increased damage from.

AttributeDefinitions.Name: Weapons
AttributeDefinitions.Description: It lists the weapons types the character is proficient in using.
